issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: Android: Add children as array not working

comments.body:
Hi Jan,
This isn't actually supported behavior. In theory it shouldn't work on iOS either. Admittedly we should perhaps fail a bit more gracefully.
Cheers.
Too bad this won't be implemented since in theory it should bring greater performance.
